name: Common Cold
symptoms: runny nose, sneezing, sore throat, mild cough
what_to_do: Rest, drink fluids, use over-the-counter decongestants if needed.

name: Flu (Influenza)
symptoms: high fever, chills, body aches, fatigue, dry cough
what_to_do: Rest, hydration, antiviral meds if early; seek care if breathing issues.

name: Stomach Flu (Gastroenteritis)
what_to_do: Hydrate with electrolytes, eat light foods, rest. Seek help if persistent.

name: Migraine
symptoms: throbbing headache, sensitivity to light, nausea, vision disturbance
what_to_do: Stay in dark, quiet room. Use migraine-specific medication or painkillers.

name: Allergic Reaction (Mild)
symptoms: itchy eyes, sneezing, skin rash, runny nose
what_to_do: Take antihistamines. Avoid allergen. Seek help if swelling increases.

name: Heartburn / Acid Reflux
symptoms: burning chest pain, sour taste, worse when lying down
what_to_do: Avoid spicy/fatty food. Use antacids. Sleep with head elevated.

name: Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
symptoms: burning when peeing, urge to pee often, lower belly pain
what_to_do: Drink water, seek antibiotics from a clinic. Avoid caffeine.

name: Dehydration
symptoms: dry mouth, dizziness, headache, dark urine
what_to_do: Drink water or electrolyte solutions. Rest in cool place.

name: Heatstroke
symptoms: very hot skin, no sweating, confusion, rapid pulse
what_to_do: Cool person down immediately. Call emergency services.

name: Anxiety Attack
symptoms: tingling, chest tightness, rapid breathing, sense of doom
what_to_do: Breathe slowly, sit down, talk to someone if possible. Ground yourself.
